author: FourFourTwo
description: Juventus have named forwards Mario Mandzukic and Paulo Dybala in their team to face Lazio in Wednesday's Coppa Italia final.
title: Dybala and Mandzukic passed fit for Coppa Italia final

author: FourFourTwo
description: Juventus are closing in on a famous treble after winning the Coppa Italia and Dani Alves has complete focus on sealing the top honours.
title: Dani Alves eyes 'the big prize' after historic Coppa Italia success

author: FourFourTwo
description: Juventus made history on Wednesday as they became the first team to win the Coppa Italia three times in a row after a 2-0 win over Lazio.
title: Juventus 2 Lazio 0: Alves, Bonucci secure historic third consecutive Coppa Italia

author: Football Italia Staff
description: Juventus took the Coppa Italia for the third year in a row, but who made the difference in the Final with Lazio? Football Italia rates the players.
title: Coppa Player Ratings: Juventus 2-0 Lazio

author: Football Italia Staff
description: Juventus took the Coppa Italia for the third year in a row, but who made the difference in the Final with Lazio? Football Italia rates the players.
title: Coppa Player Ratings: Juventus 2-0 Lazio

author: Football Italia Staff
description: Juventus midfielder Claudio Marchisio hails the Coppa Italia triumph, but warns “we can no longer make mistakes”.
title: Marchisio: ‘No more mistakes!’

author: Football Italia Staff
description: Max Allegri notes “the difference is in the details” when Juventus take on Lazio in the Coppa Italia Final this evening.
title: Allegri: 'Difference in the details'

author: Football Italia Staff
description: Giorgio Chiellini insists “the treble is the farthest thing” from Juventus’ minds ahead of the Coppa Italia final.
title: ‘Juventus not thinking of treble’

author: Football Italia Staff
description: Giorgio Chiellini believes the Lazio side Juventus will face in the Coppa Italia final are similar to Monaco.
title: Chiellini: ‘Lazio like Monaco’

author: FourFourTwo
description: Juventus defender Giorgio Chiellini expects a tight affair when they take on Lazio in Wednesday's Coppa Italia final.
title: Chiellini warns Juventus: Keita and Felipe Anderson are like Mbappe
